text: Every time I walk In here I am greeted immediately with a huge smile , service is always really fast and the food tastes amazing , whether I am there at 5 or right before they close . I would give them 10 stars if I could !
Really yummy food close to home I enjoyed every bite! There fries are so amazing you must try them always come out hot and fresh! And the sauce I love to get extras of :)

I love to go here for a quick snack or lunch if I can, staff are always friendly, quick smile and prompt service. I've come to know them too and it feels comfy as well knowing I can be in a place where I can eat and relax at the same time. I've always ordered their calamari, fries and pita wraps.
